Reviews.Title: Nokia 6350
Reviews.Author: M.
Reviews.Content: Great purchase and smooth transaction. Recommend purchase of this phone for the older generation that do not want a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Far Surpassed My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Raven "Yolanda Vargas"
Reviews.Content: So good if was human I'd marry it muwhahaha. Okay but seriously I love this thing, I bought this to replace a ( Nokia C3 touch and Type ) which has unbelievably tiny keys  This one however is for me the phone of my dreams it is very easy to use and for it's compact size is loaded with tons of functionsMeasurementsLength 7 inches. Width 2 inches. Depth//thickness about 1 inchFeatures and functions1-Micro USB Charging Connection. 2-Internet. 3-YP Mobile. 4-Mobile Web. 5-Media Mall. 6-Mobile Video. 7-Mobile E Maile. 8-Address Book. 9-Music. 10-My Stuff. 11-Messaging. 12-Smart Chip Applications. 13-Camera wiht zoom in and out, 14-GPS.15-Camera is immediately acessable thanks to the button on the keypad, you don;t have to go to the menu before you can acess it. like some  phones require. It  takes photos, and records like a camcorder, this includes self timer, image sequence, brightness control, effects, whitness balance, and video share call16-There is a screen on the outside so you can see who is calling without opening the phoneAppearance1-Menu functions are easy to see. 2- Colors are attractive and easy on the eyes. 3- The brightness is great. 4-Picture resolution, color,  and clarity are amazing.5-Photographs look amazing very clear, perfect color balance, sharp clear details, no bluring or distortions6-Dialing numbers in a low light situation is made easy to deal with thanks to the great backlghting of the key board which is bright. Unlike a phone I had in the past with yellow backlighting that causes eye strain this has white light like a lamp making it easy to see.SIM cardTransfering my SIM card was a snap, so you know on this phone the SIM card slides into a slot with the little gold part facing up instead of down, and is located below where the battery goes. There is a seperate slot opposite the battery for a memory cardSoundExcellent very clear, no static or distortions. hearing people talking is easy, volume control is great and easy to adjust thanks to the volume up down key on the left side of the phone. Reception is very good, there are also a nice selection of ring tones to choose from. You can also turn on or off the key beeps which I love hearing beeps with each key pressed drives me nuts

Reviews.Title: Functional
Reviews.Author: A. Stewart "native beader"
Reviews.Content: I had this same phone for over 4 years and since I had dropped it a few times, the back cover would no longer stay on tight. I saw this one while searching for a new phone. I decided to purchase it and it is as much of a phone as I need. I like it, it serves it purpose.

Reviews.Title: Battery is a serious problem
Reviews.Author: jack wolpa
Reviews.Content: I could not use the phone enough to test all of its features. Every time I went to use the phone after 24 hours itneeded to be recharged. Other customers had complained about the same problem, only that I did not see that they to had only a 24 hour limit.

Reviews.Title: Uhhhh  . . . overly conveluted, not simple to use
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: This phone might have everything you need and one might get used to it after a while but it's definitly not very easy to use.  For example, the simplest of things like checking your messages, checking who's called, changing ring tones, texting numbers, writing a text, etc. are burried under layers and layers of menu options.There is, however, a programable "go to" button on the homepage where you can file all the functions you want in one place so that may be what Nokia has in mind for users access.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: luz marina
Reviews.Content: Excellent product very good quality is what I expected when I decided to purchase this product I recommend very phone for purchase an smart phone

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: robert michael sparks
Reviews.Content: It does what it should........whats not  to like! Handy. Good visual screen! Simple to use. Sounds good with simple controls.

Reviews.Title: shuts off
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Have had problems with it.  Shuts off completely at random times, even while on the phone, won't turn back on.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I recommend it to anyone who doesn't use a smart phone. I had one before and loved it. It works great and does everything I need.

Reviews.Title: Supplier is EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: piccolo
Reviews.Content: I initially had difficulty charging battery and getting phone to work.  I had ordered another, spare, battery and that worked a little better.  Through Amazon, I contacted supplier and asked for a replacement battery since original couldn't be charged,  Supplier sent a new phone, AC charger and battery. Amazing!!  It all works well now.  However, I still like many of the features of my very old quad-band Motorola RAZR V3 (address book is better organized, changing ring to vibrate, silent, etc is easier ...) more than the Nokia 6350.  What's better about the Nokia is it's "3G" and can work with our AT&T; micro-cell tower at home which vastly improves home reception.  I had no trouble simply switching the SIM card from my old phone to the new phone.

Reviews.Title: It is wonderful works good I LOVE it. it is a very good product and I Will shop again here.
Reviews.Author: Gary Curfman
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful works good I LOVE it. it is a very good product and I Will shop again here.

Reviews.Title: dies hard
Reviews.Author: jim blick
Reviews.Content: when the battery becomes fully discharged,the phone does not want to charge and turn on.  this has happened twice so far.  got lucky and it turned on the first, but the phone is still dead after the second time. phone is only 2 months old.  other reviews say the same.  also the software is clunky--too many clicks required to do simple functions like call a contact.  voice recognition has been horrible. stay away from this phone.

Reviews.Title: A Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: The Nokia 6350 is a good phone for individuals who do not want a smart phone.  It is a flip-phone that fits into a shirt pocket.  It provides good voice quality.  It has an easy-to-use menu to navigate to set up the phone.  It does provide access to the internet, if an individual wants or needs connection.  The screen, however, is small for internet use, but it allows connection for email through various providers.

Reviews.Title: Simple and good, a mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Flavio G. F. Mendes "Flavio Mendes"
Reviews.Content: This is a simple and good mobile phone. It works like it should work. No fancy features, practical and easy

Reviews.Title: Great phone for those of us who don't need a smartphone.
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: This phone does what I wanted it to do.  Although you can use it to take pictures, listen to music, and check your email, it's main purpose is to make and receive telephone calls.  In that respect it works fine.  I had an earlier version of this phone for many years and decided to replace it only because the battery was nearing the end of its life.  (A new phone was cheaper than a new battery.) Because it is unlocked, it also works in Europe with a European SIM card.  It comes with a GPS but you have to subscribe to a GPS service for this.

Reviews.Title: Ok phone
Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my old Nokia phone.  I have had problems with it cutting out while I'm talking to my mom but I'll keep it to use when my other dies.
